name: planted.bratwurst
description: Full, juicy sausage flavor with 36% more protein and 76% less saturated fat than meat.
longDescription: Our planted.bratwurst Original delivers that authentic sausage experience you've been missing. Made from natural ingredients including peas, sunflower oil, and carefully selected spices, it offers 36% more protein and 76% less saturated fat compared to traditional sausages. Perfect for grilling, pan-frying, or enjoying with your favorite sides.
ingredients: Water, pea protein (24%), sunflower oil, pea fiber, spices, natural flavoring, salt, vitamin B12
preparation: Grill or pan-fry for 6-8 minutes, turning occasionally until golden brown. Serve with bread, mustard, and your favorite sides.

steps.title: Heat
steps.description: Grill or pan. Medium heat works best.
